title: Summer Internship Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Medanta the Medicity (Gurgaon, Haryana) in May 2023
Interview Descriptions: interview was done by the employer to work with to check what skills you have and what all you can do . What have you learnt in college and what skills you are good at.
Interview Questions: do you know any statistical software

title: Pharmacist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Medanta the Medicity (New Delhi)
Interview Descriptions: They ask me few questions and I have Anwser them all wonderful organisations good and they work very ell we need this type of organisation and we have to improve our self
Interview Questions: Self introduction and 2 3 questions on pharmacy

title: Medical Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Medanta the Medicity in Jul 2022
Interview Descriptions: Interview average.One single interview with 2 interviewers.Asked basic medical emergencies.And gave various scenarios.Described the job requirements well.Didn't discuss salary at the time.Took around 45 minutes.Took their sweet time to revert back.

title: Clinical Pharmacist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Medanta the Medicity (Gurgaon, Haryana) in Oct 2021
Interview Descriptions: Applied through LinkedIn for the online recruitment drive for junior clinical pharmacist . First round was selection of resume Online interview was via zoom platform Second round group discussion Third round interview with HOD
Interview Questions: 1. Classification of Antibiotics and Anticancer agents 2. Questions related to project 3. Questions from any one case scenario

title: Pharmacist Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Medanta the Medicity (Patna, Bihar) in Sept 2021
Interview Descriptions:
They take interview mainly in 2 step:-
In first step they ask you about your introduction part
In second step they ask questions related to subjects like pharmacy practice and pharmacology basic.
Interview Questions:
Tell me about yourself?
Tell me about how will you manage pharmacy?
Tell me about schedule classes?
Tell me about salt used in crocin?
What should be the temp range for vaccines?
What should be the temp of pharmacy?

title: Medical Transcriptionist Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Medanta the Medicity (Gurgaon, Haryana) in Oct 2020
Interview Descriptions: Good, They ask for basic details nothing much more. Easy to crack for a person with good communication skills. The pay scale is fair but not as per the metro culture.
Interview Questions: Good, They ask for basic details nothing much more. Easy to crack for a person with good communication skills. The pay scale is fair but not as per the metro culture.

title: Executive Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Medanta the Medicity (Gurgaon, Haryana)
Interview Descriptions: Directly interviewed by managers about supply chain management. They asked simplified questions like; how controlling the inventory and operating the patient-centric items to deliver to the patient and how you arranging the sutures.

title: Legal Counsel Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Medanta the Medicity (New Delhi) in Sept 2018
Interview Descriptions: Utterly unprofessional. The HR calls and fixes the date of telephonic interview that the legal manager will make a call, but no call comes on the specific date. On calling the HR personnel, he keeps on delaying it, and that continues for 3 more times. When the HR is strictly asked for a final date for interview, blocks the candidate's number.
Interview Questions: Are you free tomorrow for interview

title: Manager Finance Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Medanta the Medicity (Gurgaon, Haryana) in Jun 2018
Interview Descriptions: It would take 2 different for different stages . Not so much technical. Just a brief introduction. Only things is that you should wait normally one hour about to availability of interviewer.
Interview Questions: Normal domain question related to specific of your profile

title: Patient Care Services Interview
Application Type: The process took 6 days. I interviewed at Medanta the Medicity (Jaipur, Rajasthan) in Jan 2018
Interview Descriptions:
GD,aptitude and Followed by PI 
Process is quite easy. They ask basic questions during the PI round which is further divided into two rounds the HR followed by the technical round

title: Senior Executive Or A Team Leader Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Medanta the Medicity (Gurgaon, Haryana)
Interview Descriptions: Interview process is based on the company portfolio short listing and seeing for the better suited candidate for the job who understands and owns responsibility with sincerity honesty and with compassion for the post he wants to see himself and to ensure that what the is capable of or he/she  can do to be on that postion and what he AIM to be being in the company..

title: Senior Manager -Audit Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Medanta the Medicity
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was quick and as i came early they didn't make me wait and started early .Questions were to the point and structured in such a way that they make you to use your life's live examples.
Interview Questions: One incident that you handled all alone where decision making was involved.

title: Consultant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Medanta the Medicity (New Delhi) in Mar 2013
Interview Descriptions: Not much words, Doctors know the abilities of each other. so our community know what the other person can do. Will you take this pathetic salary because I an offering you as prasadam. Take it and touch my feet
Interview Questions: Will you work here for long.

title: Staff Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Medanta the Medicity (Gurgaon, Haryana)
Interview Descriptions: thats very good.under human resourse mnagement will do...recruting training program....breafing then send to our qualfied block..their is one trainer...then after we will do our individual performance....under supervisers,docters,a big team is their .yearly performance award programs games....price just enjoyment also.i think it is very good experiance is there.

title: Clinical Research Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Medanta the Medicity (Gurgaon, Haryana) in Apr 2012
Interview Descriptions: meeting wieh DGM that with chairman

title: Attending Consultant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Medanta the Medicity (Gurgaon, Haryana) in Apr 2012
Interview Descriptions: there may be 2-3 interviews before shortlisting you,and they are genuine.

title: Medical Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Medanta the Medicity (Gurgaon, Haryana) in Mar 2012
